channel.title: eBPF - The latest news, updates and articles covering eBPF and related topics.
channel.description: eBPF is a revolutionary technology that can run sandboxed programs in the Linux kernel without changing kernel source code or loading a kernel module.

item.title: 【Recent Crowdstrike Outage Emphasizes the Need for Less Intrusive Malware Behavior Detection Technologies】最近的 Crowdstrike 中断凸显了对侵入性较小的恶意软件行为检测技术的需求
item.description: 【CrowdStrike outage sparks debate on Windows security, highlighting eBPF's absence and the need for less intrusive alternatives to kernel drivers】CrowdStrike 中断引发了有关 Windows 安全性的争论，凸显了 eBPF 的缺失以及对内核驱动程序的侵入性较小的替代方案的需求

item.title: 【‍Comparing eBPF and Kernel Modules for Application Vulnerability Detection and Attack Monitoring】‍eBPF 和内核模块在应用程序漏洞检测和攻击监控方面的比较
item.description: 【A comparison between eBPF and Kernel modules across various factors, assessing their viability as a context capture tool for application security vulnerability detection and attack monitoring purposes】eBPF 和内核模块在各种因素上的比较，评估它们作为应用程序安全漏洞检测和攻击监控目的的上下文捕获工具的可行性

item.title: 【Observability Cost-Savings and eBPF Goodness with Groundcover】Groundcover 的可观测性成本节约和 eBPF 优点
item.description: 【Bret Fisher is joined by Shahar Azulay, Groundcover CEO and Co-Founder, to discuss their new approach to fully observe K8s and its workloads with a hybrid observability architecture and eBPF】Bret Fisher 与 Groundcover 首席执行官兼联合创始人 Shahar Azulay 一起讨论他们通过混合可观测性架构和 eBPF 全面观察 K8s 及其工作负载的新方法

item.title: 【Recent CrowdStrike Outage Emphasizes the Need for eBPF-Based Sensors】最近的 CrowdStrike 中断凸显了对基于 eBPF 的传感器的需求
item.description: 【Global IT disruption caused by a Windows security update fuels debate on adopting eBPF for more resilient endpoint protection】Windows 安全更新造成的全球 IT 中断引发了关于采用 eBPF 实现更具弹性的端点保护的争论

item.title: 【eBPF use cases】eBPF 用例
item.description: 【Dive deep into the intricacies of eBPF, unraveling its capabilities and exploring its seamless integration within the Kubernetes landscape】深入研究 eBPF 的复杂性，揭示其功能并探索其在 Kubernetes 环境中的无缝集成

item.title: 【How Open Source Project Tetragon Is Evolving Security via eBPF】开源项目 Tetragon 如何通过 eBPF 改进安全性
item.description: 【Learn how Tetragon leverages eBPF to revolutionize runtime security, offering deep observability and real-time enforcement for cloud native environments】了解 Tetragon 如何利用 eBPF 彻底改变运行时安全性，为云原生环境提供深度可观察性和实时实施

item.title: 【eBPF on WSL2 [kernel version 6.x] [Ubuntu] [x64] [Arm64] [2024]】WSL2 上的 eBPF [内核版本 6.x] [Ubuntu] [x64] [Arm64] [2024]
item.description: 【Learn how to develop and run eBPF programs on WSL2】了解如何在 WSL2 上开发和运行 eBPF 程序

item.title: 【‍Could eBPF Save Us From CrowdStrike-Style Disasters?】‍eBPF 能否将我们从 CrowdStrike 式的灾难中拯救出来？
item.description: 【The New Stack discusses the potential of eBPF to provide deep visibility into system operations, thereby helping to prevent and mitigate security incidents similar to the CrowdStrike outage】新堆栈讨论了 eBPF 提供对系统操作的深入可见性的潜力，从而有助于预防和减轻类似于 CrowdStrike 中断的安全事件

item.title: 【No More Blue Fridays】不再有蓝色星期五
item.description: 【Brendan Gregg discusses the recent Windows outage caused by a kernel update and advocates for eBPF to prevent such crashes, enhancing software reliability in Linux and Windows】Brendan Gregg 讨论了最近由内核更新导致的 Windows 中断，并提倡使用 eBPF 来防止此类崩溃，从而增强 Linux 和 Windows 中的软件可靠性

item.title: 【Using eBPF for Better Kubernetes Performance】使用 eBPF 提高 Kubernetes 性能
item.description: 【Scott Moore and Donald Lutz discuss their experiences using eBPF, its performance and some of the pitfalls to watch out for】Scott Moore 和 Donald Lutz 讨论了他们使用 eBPF 的经验、其性能以及需要注意的一些陷阱
